title: Ukraine Wants to Join the E.U. to Secure Peace. Here’s What to Know.
summary_full: Negotiators agree that joining the bloc is critical to Kyiv’s future. But obstacles abound, and compromises might forever change how the union works.
summary_public: Negotiators agree that joining the bloc is critical to Kyiv’s future. But obstacles abound, and compromises might forever change how the union works.
